instructions: Image titled Download Facebook Step 1 1 Open your iPhone's Image titled Iphoneappstoreicon.png App Store. Tap the App Store app icon, which resembles a white "A" on a light-blue background. Image titled Download Facebook Step 2 2 Tap . It's a tab in the bottom-right corner of the App Store screen. Image titled Download Facebook Step 3 3 Tap the "App Store" text box. This is at the top of the screen. Your iPhone's on-screen keyboard will appear. Image titled Download Facebook Step 4 4 Search for Facebook. Type in facebook , then tap Search in the bottom-right corner of the keyboard. Image titled Download Facebook Step 5 5 Tap . It's to the right of the Facebook logo. If you've previously downloaded Facebook, you'll tap the cloud Image titled Iphoneappstoredownloadbutton.png icon here instead. Image titled Download Facebook Step 6 6 Enter your Touch ID or Apple ID password when prompted. Either scan your Touch ID fingerprint or type in your Apple ID password to prompt Facebook to begin installing. iPhone X users can simply look at the iPhone's screen to use the Face ID feature. You can open Facebook as soon as it finishes installing by tapping OPEN in the App Store (or by tapping the Facebook app icon on one of the Home Screens). Advertisement

Image titled Download Facebook Step 7 1 Open your Android's Image titled Androidgoogleplay.png Play Store. Tap the Play Store app icon, which resembles a multicolored triangle on a white background. Image titled Download Facebook Step 8 2 Tap the search bar. It's at the top of the Play Store page. Your Android's on-screen keyboard will appear. Image titled Download Facebook Step 9 3 Search for Facebook. Type facebook into the search bar. A drop-down menu with related results will appear. Image titled Download Facebook Step 10 4 Tap . It's in the drop-down menu. Doing so opens the Facebook app page. Image titled Download Facebook Step 11 5 Tap . This is at the top of the page. Image titled Download Facebook Step 12 6 Tap if prompted. Facebook will begin installing onto your Android. You can open Facebook as soon as it finishes installing by tapping OPEN in the Play Store (or by tapping the Facebook app icon in the App Drawer). Advertisement
